content: this is a basic toe-up sock pattern with a 3-1 ribbing and a slip_stitch heel the ribbing makes the fit more forgiving the heel is designed to not interrupt the striping pattern on the top of the sock which is great if you re using self striping yarn consider brenda and heather yarns for your sock knitting needs visit our online store https //squareup com/store/brendaandheatheryarns/ 1 1 https //squareup com/store/brendaandheatheryarns/
